dict.string: CheerLens needs access to your camera to detect your facial expressions and analyze smile probability during interview practice. The app uses Google ML Kit Face Detection to process your expressions in real-time and calculate smile confidence scores. All facial analysis is processed locally on your device and is not stored or transmitted to any server. Data is discarded immediately after processing.

This app needs access to your photo library to allow you to attach screenshots when submitting feedback. You can optionally upload a screenshot of practice results or any issues you encounter. The selected image is only used to compose your feedback email and is not stored or analyzed by the app.
